item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. What is the origin of the lake tank image that has become a meme? (2021) (488 points | 107 comments)
2. Niantic announces "Large Geospatial Model" trained on Pokémon Go player data (206 points | 154 comments)
3. Show HN: Self-Host Next.js in Production (81 points | 39 comments)
4. Show HN: We Open-Sourced Our Compost Monitoring Tech – Use It for Your Projects (14 points | 2 comments)
5. Z-Library Helps Students to Overcome Academic Poverty, Study Finds (136 points | 26 comments)
6. Weight-loss drug found to shrink heart muscle in mice, human cells (136 points | 155 comments)
7. AAA – Analytical Anti-Aliasing (468 points | 71 comments)
8. Building Databases over a Weekend (18 points | discuss)
9. Electrobun: Cross-platform desktop applications written in TypeScript (21 points | 4 comments)
10. Vapi (YC W21) Is Hiring Founding Senior Engineer (Front End) ( | hide)
11. AlphaQubit: AI to identify errors in Quantum Computers (91 points | 36 comments)
12. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (31 points | 1 comment)
13. Undergraduates with family income below $200k will be tuition-free at MIT (359 points | 253 comments)
14. SQL, Homomorphisms and Constraint Satisfaction Problems (112 points | 10 comments)
15. Show HN: Autotab – Programmable AI browser for turning web tasks into APIs (59 points | 34 comments)
16. How good are American roads? (169 points | 372 comments)
17. Bit-twiddling optimizations in Zed's Rope (89 points | 31 comments)
18. Google stops letting sites like Forbes rule search for "Best CBD Gummies" (165 points | 101 comments)
19. Fashion History Timeline (4 points | discuss)
20. Apple fights to keep DOJ antitrust suit from reaching trial (37 points | 18 comments)
21. Does the Internet Route Around Damage? – Baltic Sea Cable Cuts (41 points | 8 comments)
22. Europe's Internet resilience mitigates impact of submarine cable cuts (98 points | 19 comments)
23. Between the Booms: AI in Winter – Communications of the ACM (55 points | 34 comments)
24. A Second Search for Bash Scripting Alternatives (14 points | 27 comments)
25. Exploring the Cost and Feasibility of Battery-Electric Ships (26 points | 49 comments)
26. Pipe Viewer – A Unix Utility You Should Know About (106 points | 22 comments)
27. Show HN: Cardo ‒ Open Source desktop podcast client (76 points | 27 comments)
28. Bird flu in Canada may have mutated to become more transmissible to humans (54 points | 23 comments)
29. La Basilica Di San Pietro (124 points | 58 comments)
30. Show HN: Rebuild of Blossom, an open-source social robot (49 points | 3 comments)
